detaileddescription.para: A trigger file contains a list of the detectors's labels (the number, not the name) that are required in the event (e.g. a germanium trigger file would list all the labels of the germaniums). If you want more specific trigger you have to create your own executable, include Faster2Root and follow the example 2 of the documentation of the class.

briefdescription.para: Dispatch the Faster2Root::convertFile() method through the threads.
